snippet: With its fans and detractors, the sketch comedy series “Key & Peele” — with its biracial hosts’ take on race-themed humor — is entering its second season on Comedy Central.
abstract: Comedy Central's sketch comedy series Key & Peele is entering its second season; its race-themed humor has struck a chord, both positively and negatively, with audiences.
lead_paragraph: With its fans and detractors, the sketch comedy series “Key & Peele” — with its biracial hosts’ take on race-themed humor — is entering its second season on Comedy Central.

headline.seo: ‘Key & Peele,’ on Comedy Central, Starts Second Season
headline.main: These Comics Will Play the Race Card
headline.print_headline: These Comics Will Play The Race Card
